doc.description: Compile files into single files, using javascript to call CSS when needed.

name: bbn\cdn\compiler

minify.name: minify
minify.summary: Minify the given string in the given lang (js or css).

arguments.name: st
arguments.description: The language used by the string

get_content.name: get_content
get_content.summary: Returns the content of a file or a group of files,
get_content.description: after having compiled it if needed, and minified if test is false.

description_parts.content: after having compiled it if needed, and minified if test is false.

arguments.name: file
arguments.description: If true the content will not be minified

js_links.name: js_links
js_links.summary: Returns a javascript string invoking other javascript files.

arguments.name: files
arguments.description: If true minification will not be applied

css_links.name: css_links
css_links.summary: Returns a javascript string including css files.

arguments.name: files
arguments.description: If true minification will not be applied

css_content.name: css_content
css_content.summary: Returns a string with javascript including the given CSS content in the head of the document.

compile.name: compile
compile.summary: Returns an array of compiled codes based on a list of files.

arguments.name: files
arguments.description: If true files will not be minified

group_compile.name: group_compile
group_compile.summary: Compiles together a group of files and returns the result as an array.

arguments.name: files
arguments.description: If true files will not be minified

test.name: test
test.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: test
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

check.name: check
check.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: check
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

__call.name: __call

parent.name: __call

summary: Compile files into single files, using javascript to call CSS when needed.
